entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
